Module comp310_f21_hw08_comp310_f21_hw08_36
Package provided.pubsubsync

Interface IPubSubSyncConnection

public interface IPubSubSyncConnection
Interface that provides static methods that enable an IPubSubSyncManager to pulled down from the pubsub sync server machine. Note that RMI operations require the use of the *local* IRMIUtils instance.
Author:
Stephen Wong (c) 2020

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static String
    PUBSUBSYNC_REGISTRY_BOUND_NAME
    The bound name of the IDiscoveryManager object
    static String
    PUBSUBSYNC_REGISTRY_IP_ADDR
    The default IP address of the discovery server machine.

  • Method Details

    • getPubSubSyncManager

      static IPubSubSyncManager getPubSubSyncManager​(ILogger logger, IRMIUtils rmiUtils, int stubPort) throws RemoteException
      Get a pubsub sync manager from the default IP address The supplied IRMIUtils instance MUST be ALREADY STARTED!
      Parameters:
      logger - The logger for the pubsub sync manager to use
      rmiUtils - A *STARTED* IRMIUtils instance
      stubPort - the RMI stub port being used by the application.
      Returns:
      An IPubSubSyncManager instance, already started.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - In the event of communications errors with the pubsub sync server

    • getPubSubSyncManagerAt

      static IPubSubSyncManager getPubSubSyncManagerAt​(ILogger logger, IRMIUtils rmiUtils, int stubPort, String ipAddr) throws RemoteException
      Get a pubsub sync manager from a specific IP address. The supplied IRMIUtils instance MUST be ALREADY STARTED!
      Parameters:
      logger - The logger for the pubsub sync manager to use
      rmiUtils - A *STARTED* IRMIUtils instance
      stubPort - the RMI stub port being used by the application.
      ipAddr - The IP address of the discovery server's Registry
      Returns:
      An IPubSubSyncManager instance, already started.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - In the event of communications errors with the pubsub sync server
